listContent: ActiveCampaign lets you send personalized messages, newsletters, automated follow-ups to customers. You can also customize messages, segment your contacts to automate emails, manage your pipelines, organize customer data, and more.
By connecting Chargebee with ActiveCampaign, you can automatically synchronize your subscription data to ActiveCampaign. This will help you create customized campaigns targeting your customers

inputFields.desc: I'm aware that Active Campaign may store your customer and subscription data. Please refer to ActiveCampaign's Terms of Service, Consent Policy, and Privacy Policy.
I agree to the Chargebee's terms and conditions

message.message: You can get your Base URL and API secret from ActiveCampaign by navigating to Settings > Developer

popUp.title: Connect to ActiveCampaign
popUp.description: Specify your ActiveCampaign Base URL and API secret
